# PriceHero
A python module that will allow users to get product prices information from a multitude of different websites. 

Table of Contents:  
1 ----------- Long Description  
2 ----------- Notifications  
3 ----------- Installation  
4 ----------- Supported Websites  

## Supported Websites
1. Amazon
2. Acer
3. Dell
4. Michaels
5. BestBuy
6. Walmart
7. Joanns
8. Home Depot
9. Adafruit
10. Xbox
11. Github Shop
12. Macys
